SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.commands

Class StructureTargetCommand

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.commands.BaseCommand
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.commands.StructureTargetCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddOwner, Delete, Info, Lock, MovePowerBlock, RemoveOwner, SetBlocksToMove, SetOpenDirection, SetOpenStatus
public abstract class StructureTargetCommand extends BaseCommand
Represents a command that relates to an existing structure.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Details

    • executeCommand

      protected final CompletableFuture<?> executeCommand(PermissionsStatus permissions)
      Description copied from class: BaseCommand
      Executes the command. This method is only called if BaseCommand.validInput() and BaseCommand.hasPermission() are true.

      Note that this method is called asynchronously.

      Specified by:
      executeCommand in class BaseCommand
      Parameters:
      permissions - Whether the ICommandSender has user and/or admin permissions.
      Returns:
      The future of the command execution.

    • sendUpdatedInfo

      protected void sendUpdatedInfo(AbstractStructure structure)
      Sends the updated info of the structure to the ICommandSender.

      Only applies if sendUpdatedInfo is true.

      Parameters:
      structure - The structure to send the updated info of.

    • isAllowed

      protected boolean isAllowed(AbstractStructure structure, boolean bypassPermission)
      Checks if execution of this command is allowed for the given AbstractStructure.
      Parameters:
      structure - The AbstractStructure that is the target for this command.
      bypassPermission - Whether the ICommandSender has bypass access.
      Returns:
      True if execution of this command is allowed.

    • handleDatabaseActionResult

      protected final void handleDatabaseActionResult(DatabaseManager.ActionResult result)
      Handles the results of a database action by informing the user of any non-success states.

      To customize the handling, you can override handleDatabaseActionFail(), handleDatabaseActionCancelled(), or handleDatabaseActionSuccess().

      Parameters:
      result - The result obtained from the database.

    • getStructureRetriever

      public StructureRetriever getStructureRetriever()

    • getStructureAttribute

      public StructureAttribute getStructureAttribute()

    • getRetrieverResult

      @Nullable public @Nullable AbstractStructure getRetrieverResult()
      The result of the structureRetriever.

      This will not be available until after executeCommand(PermissionsStatus) has started, but before performAction(AbstractStructure) is called.

      Even after the result has been set, it may still be null in case no doors were found.

    • setRetrieverResult

      public void setRetrieverResult(@Nullable @Nullable AbstractStructure retrieverResult)
      The result of the structureRetriever.

      This will not be available until after executeCommand(PermissionsStatus) has started, but before performAction(AbstractStructure) is called.

      Even after the result has been set, it may still be null in case no doors were found.
